On Mon, 2006-02-13 at 17:04, kjerken wrote:
> There are two features I would like to see in Heritrix, and before I
> implement them, I would like to ask if anyone else has, and if so, if
> they would be willing to share them.
> 
> The first is to insert the results of a crawl into a database (MySQL,
> as usual).  I know at least two other people have gone over this
> before on the list, but has their code ever been suggested for
> incorporation or made public?  (I've e-mailed them, but thought I'd
> ask here just in case).

What do you mean, "the results of a crawl"?  If you're talking about
putting all the downloaded files into MySQL, good luck!  I doubt that
would scale very far (though if your project is small, it may be
enough).  Otherwise, you'll have to define what you want to put in.  We
do an extract based on host-report.txt and put that into a Derby DB, but
we've defined ourselves which bits we want in there.

-Lars
